Hi All,

I've released the first public version of XmlTestSuite.
See
    http://xmltestsuite.sourceforge.net/
for full details

In summary - XmlTestSuite provides a powerful way to test web 
applications. 

Whilst trying to develop test programs in java and httpunit,
we found ourselves repeatedly reusing tests with different data.
We evaluated a number of other applications based on junit and 
httpunit, 
but we didn't find anything that met our requirements.
XmlTestSuite is the result of our efforts to test our web 
applications.


The main aims of XmlTestSuite are:

- Tests are written in XML
- Writing tests requires only a knowledge of HTML and XML
- Testing encompasses all parts of the system including the database 
and file system.
- Test environment is easily extended with new test classes
- Enables test driven development
- Enables functional testing
- Full compatibility with junit

Any feedback (here or via sourceforge) appreciated.

Regards
David Rutter
